```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

1.  Find the slope of f(x)= x \^ 2 , x = 3

    ```{r}
    fx = expression( x ^ 2)
    x = 3
    D = D(fx, 'x')
    eval(D)
    ```

2.  Find the slope of P(a)= 2(3a+2)^4âˆ’5, a=1.2

    ```{r}
    ax = expression(2 * (3 * a + 2) ^ 4 - 5)
    a = 1.2
    dax = D(ax, 'a')
    eval(dax)
    ```
